Description: Brush made from palm leaf. The brush element is held together with a binding (also of palm leaf) around the end of the brush to create a handle, and lower down to create three separate bunches.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), House X19 Room 1 Crypt 1 fill
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
